Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.interfaces

Interface WorkerSpecialityService

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkerSpecialityServiceImpl
@Service public interface WorkerSpecialityService
Service interface for handling operations related to workerSpecialities.

  • Method Details

    • getWorkerSpecialityList

      List<WorkerSpeciality> getWorkerSpecialityList()
      Retrieves a list of all workerSpecialities.
      Returns:
      A list of WorkerSpeciality representing all available workerSpecialities.

    • getWorkerSpecialityById

      WorkerSpeciality getWorkerSpecialityById(Long id)
      Retrieves a specific workerSpeciality by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the worker speciality to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A WorkerSpeciality representing the worker speciality with the specified ID.

    • createWorkerSpeciality

      WorkerSpeciality createWorkerSpeciality(WorkerSpecialityRequestDto workerSpecialityRequestDto)
      Creates a new workerSpeciality.
      Parameters:
      workerSpecialityRequestDto - The DTO containing the details of the workerSpeciality to be created.
      Returns:
      A WorkerSpeciality representing the newly created workerSpeciality.

    • updateWorkerSpeciality

      WorkerSpeciality updateWorkerSpeciality(Long id, WorkerSpecialityRequestDto workerSpecialityRequestDto)
      Updates an existing workerSpeciality.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the worker speciality to update.
      workerSpecialityRequestDto - The DTO containing the updated details of the worker speciality.
      Returns:
      A WorkerSpeciality representing the updated workerSpeciality.

    • deleteWorkerSpecialityById

      void deleteWorkerSpecialityById(Long id)
      Deletes a workerSpeciality by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the worker speciality to delete.
